instructions.en: Steam broccoli and cauliflower florets until crisp-tender, 6-8 minutes
instructions.sk: Parne varte ružičky brokolice a karfiolu, kým nebudú chrumkavé, 6-8 minút
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーとカリフラワーの小花を6〜8分蒸し、歯ごたえが残る程度に仕上げる

instructions.en: Drain vegetables well and season with salt and pepper
instructions.sk: Zeleninu dobre sceďte a ochuťte soľou a korením
instructions.ja: 野菜の水気をよく切り、塩コショウで味を調える

instructions.en: Place seasoned vegetables in a greased 9x13 inch baking pan
instructions.sk: Ochutenú zeleninu vložte do vymastenej zapekacej misy 23x33 cm
instructions.ja: 味付けした野菜を油を塗った23x33cmの焼き皿に入れる

instructions.en: In a medium bowl, mix mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup parmesan cheese, chopped green onions, Dijon mustard, and cayenne
instructions.sk: V strednej miske zmiešajte majonézu, čedar, 1/2 šálky parmezánu, nakrájanú jarnú cibuľku, dijonskú horčicu a kajenské korenie
instructions.ja: 中くらいのボウルでマヨネーズ、チェダーチーズ、パルメザンチーズ1/2カップ、刻んだ青ネギ、ディジョンマスタード、カイエンペッパーを混ぜる

instructions.en: Spoon the mixture over the vegetables and spread evenly
instructions.sk: Nalejte zmes na zeleninu a rovnomerne rozotrite
instructions.ja: 混ぜたものを野菜の上にかけ、均等に広げる

instructions.en: Sprinkle 3 tablespoons of parmesan cheese over the top
instructions.ja: 上から3大さじのパルメザンチーズをふりかける

instructions.en: Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20-25 minutes until the topping is golden brown and bubbly
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 175°C 20-25 minút, kým nebude vrch zlatohnedý a bublinkový
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで20〜25分、上部が金色に焼け、泡立つまで焼く
